page.title: 20EVENTS
page.content: We have been unable to complete the survey to our satisfaction.We have not been able to take the photographs because of a ban on out of school activities whilst the teachers' unions have been attempting to achieve a just reward for their members'efforts. We have suffered considerable hardship in this area throughout the year of the miners'strike when many of our families have suffered privation.I feel that to omit mentioning these events would be a most serious omission for events such as these are a significant indication of the state of this country in 1985. Our neighbourhood comprehensive school closes today-a further spur to out migration.We no longer have a waiting list for council houses and no pit remains in the Durham constituency.
